channel.title: OK i tried adding NPC drops and this happend
channel.description:
[code]Your server is now online. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 45 at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:2086) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:569) at server.main(server.java:164) Connection from 89-139-105-204.bb.netvision.net.il:2302 Hallowen: character file not found. [/code]
What is that error please? that is when i turn server on btw

item.title: OK i tried adding NPC drops and this happend
item.dc:creator: @I_AM_LEGEND I_AM_LEGEND
item.description:
@I_AM_LEGEND wrote:

you have an error in npchandler.

in 317 i only use npchandler to add what they say.

give me the latest code you added

Read full topic
